name: Secret of Margrave Manor
description:
This classic hidden object game has been brought back to life and is now available on mobile and tablet devices featuring updated images and artwork! You can immerse yourself in Margrave Manor and search its many rooms, with over 150 levels available in story mode!

In between completing the hidden object games and working your way through the spooky family Manor in search of your missing Grandfather, you can also uncover the secrets of the Manor by piecing together letter’s and journal entries that can be found along the way.

Can you help Edwina find her Grandfather and discover her family’s secrets?
